LinkItem.internal_link_text: How to get an Azure AD tenant
How to get an Azure AD tenant

CodeSpanItem.ItemValue: cd azuread - or- mkdir azuread; cd azuread
cd azuread - or- mkdir azuread; cd azuread

$npm install -g jsontool
$sudo mongod

$ cd azuread $ node server.js
$ curl -isS http://127.0.0.1:8888 | json HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Content-Length: 145 Date: Wed, 29 Jan 2014 03:41:24 GMT
[ "GET /", "POST /tasks/:owner/:task", "GET /tasks", "DELETE /tasks", "PUT /tasks/:owner", "GET /tasks/:owner", "DELETE /tasks/:task" ]

HTTP/1.1 201 Created Connection: close Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * Access-Control-Allow-Headers: X-Requested-With Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Content-Length: 5 Date: Tue, 04 Feb 2014 01:02:26 GMT
Hello
$ curl -isS http://127.0.0.1:8888/tasks/brandon/
server.use(restify.authorizationParser());
server.get('/tasks', passport.authenticate('provider', { session: false }), listTasks);
$sudo mongod
$ cd azuread $ node server.js

$ curl -isS http://127.0.0.1:8888/tasks/ HTTP/1.1 302 Moved Temporarily Connection: close Location: https://login.windows.net/468a75f4-f9a7-4dc4-a527-4f4522734790/oauth2/authorize?response_type=code&redirect_uri=&client_id=123 Content-Length: 0 Date: Tue, 04 Feb 2014 02:15:14 GMT
